comment: The induced metric of a normed complex vector space is a metric space. Part of Definition 2.2-1 of [Kreyszig] p. 58. (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
